text: on the words CZECH AIRLINE.  We are panning across the wo on the side of the plane.

on a tray table.  Crumpled Czech bills and coins are on i Hands are counting the money.  The airline hostess announ the arrival at JFK - in CZECH.  A hand reaches into a bre pocket - pulling out two passports.  One is opened.  Belo to EMIL SLOVAK.  The next passport belongs to OLEG RAZGUL The hand passes the Oleg Razgul passport to the man next him.  We notice several empty airline bottles of vodka an small disposable camera on Oleg's tray table.  The passpo is set down.  Oleg picks it up.  We hear Emil's voice in CZECH.  The scene is subtitled in ENGLISH.
Just do what I do.  Say the same thing I say.  Don't open your mouth.
Okay.

CAMERA DOLLIES down a long line of passengers.  They are split into two lines - one for Americans, the other for visitors.  CAMERA finally arrives at EMIL SLOVAK.  An unshaven Czech in his mid-30's.  Tall, scraggly beard.  Piercing blue eyes.  He's dressed in an outdated suit.  H eyes are alert, cunning and smart. OLEG RAZGUL, stands in line behind Emil.  Oleg is big.  N tall - but wide.  A wrestler's body.  Emil looks at Oleg. (The following is in CZECH and subtitled in ENGLISH.)
Don't fool around.
Okay. Oleg holds up his disposable camera - at arms length - to take a picture of himself.
Did you hear what I said?
I want to document my trip to America.
Next. (Emil steps up)
Could I see your documents, please?
Yes sir. He hands the passport to the officer who runs it through image swipe.  Emil glances furtively back to Oleg.
What is your intended purpose of your visit to the United States?
Two weeks holiday.
How much money are you carrying with you?
I have five-hundred dollars.
Can you show me?  Sir, no cameras in the FIS area! Oleg was about to take a picture of Emil and the Immigrat Officer.  Oleg puts the camera away.  Smiles sheepishly.
(to Emil)
Is he with you?  Are you travelling together?
Yes.
Please join us. (to Oleg)
Come on forward.
Is there a problem?
No, you're travelling together.  I want to talk to you together.  Hi, how are you?  Can I take a look at your documents? (takes Oleg's passport)
Are you related?
Yes...he's my friend.
Okay.  You're a Czech national and you're a Russian national.  How do you know one another? Oleg starts to speak, but Emil cuts him off.
We are both from Prague.
(to Oleg)
How long are you planning to stay?
Two weeks.
I'd like to speak for himself, okay?
He doesn't speak English.
I speak English.
(to Oleg)
Then answer my questions.  Where were you planning to stay during the two weeks that you're here?
New York.
Yes, we're in New York now.  But where are you planning to stay in New York?
A cheap hotel.
What are you coming here to do?
I'm here for movies.
Movies...to be in the movies or to see movies?

Yes.  No.  Both.  When I was a boy, I see movie at school called "It's a Wonderful Life" directed by Frank Capra.  Ever since I want to come to America.  Land of the free.  Home of the brave.  A land where anyone can be anything. As long as they are white.
Excuse me?
He made joke, bad joke.  First time on airplane... The SUPERVISOR comes over to see what the problem is:
Well, they've got valid visas, but they don't have much money.  Uh... and I'm not...uh, I think there's a possibility they may be coming to live and reside.
Look how long the line is.  We gotta move 'em out.  I'll take them down to secondary. Emil looks at Oleg, pissed.

The place is empty except for one table at the end of the bar.  EDDIE FLEMMING, Manhattan's most famous detective, his savvy, black partner, LEON JACKSON are having cocktai Eddie is smoothly handsome, tough, smart and tired.  Not is he the best homicide detective Manhattan has ever seen he's continually mentioned in New York columns and has be the subject of several magazine articles.  There's even b a TV movie about one of his biggest cases.  Leon has been with Eddie a long time and was also featured in the TV mo Sitting with Eddie and Leon is ROBERT HAWKINS, host and s reporter for the tabloid show, "Top Story."  Hawkins is a the best in the business and has dealt with them all: Joe Buttafuco and Amy Fisher, Lorena Bobbit and OJ. Wait staff bustles in the b.g. doing the morning set up.  Hawkins listens as Eddie, cigar in hand, finishes a "war story" and a vodka tonic at the same time.

So we're waitin' to hit this warrant - we got Emergency Service with the heavy weapons standin' by - ready to go.  I say, lemme get a cigar outta the car.  I go to get the cigar and BOOM!  All the sudden I turn around and a kid with a shotgun let one go.  Right where I was standin'.  That coulda been it.  I coulda had my head blown off and for what?  Some stupid kid got panicky, takes the safety off and it's over.  If I hadn't gone back for that cigar - for a bad habit - I would've had my head blown off.
Jesus Christ. PAULIE, the owner, walks up.
Speakin' of bad habits, everybody okay?
Another martini.
Coffee for me, I gotta slow down.
Vodka tonic.
(rethinks it)
Maybe you could just put in a shot of Martell? Paulie takes the drinks off the table and an empty bottle vodka.
(of Eddie's story)
It was freaky, I'll tell you.  Stupid kid.

What's the kid gonna say - sorry?  Meanwhile I'm not here anymore.  Like last week - we were at the morgue and this guy was all chopped up - spleen here - liver there - his heart in a pan.  Six hours ago this guy was walkin' his dog or buyin' a quart of milk.  Who knows?  But some kid's robbed him for $3 or some shit and shot him and now you can't tell if he's a piece of beef or a human being and I'm thinkin' that's me.  Sooner or later.  That's me.
Sooner or later that's everybody.
Not chopped up.  Not chopped up like that.  I mean, what do I got left?  Coupla articles.  A medal or two.  Plaque here and there and in a coupla years no one remembers me anymore.
I think you're getting a little moody there, Eddie.
I'm not moody. Hawkins and Leon share a look.
Isn't he a little moody?
Of course he's moody.  He thinks he's in love.
In love?  With who? Paulie delivers the drinks and sets some cigars on the ta Takes a seat next to Eddie.  Eddie asks Hawkins.
How old are your kids?

My kids?  Let's see...Susan's 15.  Aundrea's 9.  Don't tell me you're thinking about having a kid!  How old are you?  Never mind.  Let me just tell you this: Every stupid cliche you hear about kids - they change your life, they make you a better person, they make you whole... (beat)
It's all true!  Before I had kids when friends talked about their kids, I wanted to vomit.  Now -- I get it.  Am I right, Leon?
Absomotherfuckin'lutely.  You can have all three of my ex-wives.  But somebody so much as looks sideways at my four girls -- I'd kill 'em.   (takes out his wallet)
You haven't seen my youngest have you? As he hands pictures to Hawkins his cell phone rings.
Yeah?
Paulie, you've got kids, right?
My kids don't talk to me anymore but they were great when they were young.
(into the phone)
Sure it's him?  Great! (collapses the phone)
Unique's home. They all rise from the table.
Paulie, I need the cure.
Step into my office. Leon and Hawkins sit back down as Eddie and Paulie leave.
So you got your kids listening to Opera?  You still singing in the church on the weekends?
Now other officers are questioning Emil and Oleg.  They'v been there a while.  The SECONDARY OFFICER is looking Ole
Okay.  You work in a vodka factory.  I understand that. (to Emil)
And what kind of work do you do?
I am butcher.
You're a butcher?  What do you use pig intestines for?
You stuff sausage in it.
And what do you do with the bones?
Dog food. Emil looks at Oleg.  Blaming his stupid responses at Pass Control for their detainment.
Are you married?
No.  Are you proposing?
through a thousand ICE CUBES.  A face plunges towards us.
Eddie has his back to us as he dunks his face into a sink full of ice.  He dries his face, looks into his bloodshot eyes.  Presents a small black ring box to the mirror.
Will you marry me?  Wanna get married?  What are you doin' Saturday? Leon enters.  Eddie turns.
I'm gonna propose.
When?
Tomorrow.  At lunch.
You ready? Eddie leans back and drops some Visine in his eyes.  Turn
The thrill of the hunt.  I love it.
Oleg and Emil stare at the bright lights - all the nonsto action.  Each stands with an old suitcase.
(in Russian)
Look.  Times Square.  Just like in the movies!
(in Czech)
Don't speak Russian!
(in Russian)
Why?  Why do I always have to speak to you in Czech?
(in Czech)

Because I don't like your ugly language.  I heard enough of it in school!  Now speak Czech or English.  And don't fool around anymore.  You almost got us thrown out! Emil pulls out an envelope with Milos' address on it.  Th is who they came to see.  Emil hails a CAB.  Oleg is star inside a camera store - at himself on a monitor.  A videocamera's pointed out in the street.
Look.  New videocameras.  Color viewfinder.  Image stabilization.  Solarization.  Night vision.
We have no money.  Come on. Oleg stares at the videocamera - dying to have one like t Emil slides into the cab.
Where you wanna go, buddy? Emil pulls out the post-marked envelope.  Points to the return address on it and passes it through the slot to th Cabbie.

Here. Emil looks out the window - no sign of Oleg.  Then, Oleg hurries out the camera store, gripping something inside h coat.  He flings both suitcases in the trunk, SLAMS it sh and jumps in the back seat.  He opens his jacket - pullin out the VIDEOCAMERA he just stole.
Go! Oleg smiles sheepishly at Emil.
Eddie's car pulls up.  Eddie, Leon and Hawkins get out.
So what's unique?
Not what.  Who. Eddie passes Hawkins a Polaroid - of a woman on a bed - covered in blood.
He's from Antigua.  His girlfriend was taking too long to put her make-up on.  they were late for a party.  Stabbed her with a beer bottle.
That's unique.
Yeah.  And he still went to the party. Leon moves to a LOOKOUT - gives him a twenty.
Top floor.  Back room.

Yeah.  I make big cases, they make the news and I look good.  But the problem with becoming a star is downtown.  They shoot at stars.  Now be quiet.  Shhh. As they reach the doorway - Eddie surprises two crackhead Waves them off.  They hurry away.
I hope this prick doesn't run.  My knees are killing me.  Stay behind me.
You're worried for my safety.  I'm touched. Eddie flattens against the building - watches Unique desc the fire escape.
Ready?
Keep them out of my way.
Okay.  You ready?
Yeah, yeah.  Jesus. Eddie closes in.
(into his cell phone)

Unique is climbing down the fire escape - before he gets the bottom, Leon bursts through a door behind him and kic the fire escape, sending Unique flying into the alley.  W he lands dropping his gun. Eddie pulls him off the ground as Leon scoops the gun up.
What's your rush?  Going to a party?
Why you chasin' me, man?
I don't know.  You always come outta your house that way?
It's not my house, man.  I don't live here.
Well, sounds like burglary to me. Leon cuffs Unique who recognizes Eddie.
I know you man. An unmarked van comes tearing into the scene.  Disgorges mini-cam team that starts filming but they missed the bus
(to Eddie)
Any chance we can do that again?
Again?  I didn't wanna do it the first time.

The cab is in front of an old five-story brownstone.  Ole gets the bags out of the trunk as Emil tucks the envelope into his jacket, then steps up to the old building.  He l back at Oleg - who's VIDEOTAPING him.
Turn that off!  Get the bags.
Why should I carry your bag?  I am not a dog.
For five years I paid for your stupidness - you'll carry my bag for the rest of my life if I say so. (challenging)
Unless you refuse, Oleg. Oleg looks at Emil.  Even though Oleg is stronger than Em he fears him.  He picks up both bags.  Emil searches the occupant list over the buzzers to the apartment building.
There.  5RW. Emil pushes ten of the buzzers except 5RW.  A BUZZER clic and Emil pushes it open.
The brownstone has no elevator so Emil and Oleg climb the stairs... Oleg cradling his camera.  Emil notices a crack pipe on the floor and picks it up.  Smells the bowl.
What?
Smell like chemicals...for smoking drugs. Emil pockets the pipe and climbs to the top floor, moving down the dirty hallway to a corner door.
He KNOCKS...FOOTSTEPS approach.  The door is opened by MI a 40-year-old Czech, dressed in stained plumbers overalls He  is surprised to see Emil and Oleg in his doorway.  Ol films him...
Emil???!
Surprise!  Surprise! Milos shoots a look across the tiny kitchen to TAMINA, hi comely wife.

Emil pushes his way inside.  Oleg follows.  Milos wears plumbers overalls but Emil notices sports a Rolex.  Tamin has on a faded dress but despite their cheaply furnished apartment she wears an expensive brushed gold necklace, bracelet and big pearl earrings.  The room is furnished w kitsch from Disney World and Las Vegas.  The only anomaly a HUGE SONY TRINITRON HOME ENTERTAINMENT CENTER.  (The following is in Czech and subtitled in English.)
Your sister said she didn't know where you were so you shouldn't write to her with return address if you're hiding.
Did you hurt her?
You know me...I never hurt anybody.  Where's the money?
Hello, Tamina. Oleg is looking Tamina over.  Milos - though scared - bar at Oleg.
Take your eyes off her, Oleg! (to Emil)
Look.  It wasn't my fault you two were caught. (of Oleg)
It's his fault.  Trying to get the bank clerk's phone number?!  I wasn't going to wait!!!
Milos.  Get my money! Oleg videotapes the scene.
All we see behind it is a WOMAN'S FACE and her wet hair - obviously came from the shower and we see the towel wrapp around her.
(nervously)
We spent it!
Ha. Ha.

Look at the way we live.  I'm a plumber.  You think I'd be working if I had money?! Emil, pissed, moves to a wood block and pulls out a KITCH KNIFE.  He grabs Tamina roughly, putting the blade to her throat.
Emil.  Put down the knife. Milos looks at his wife - who is terrified.
Emil.  I'll help you. Milos closes the gap between him and Emil - trying to cal him by talking softly.
I can get you a job.
A job?
Yes, the money is good.
As a plumber?!
It's easy to learn.
A job??  As a plumber???  You think I come to America to work!
We started over, you can too.
(furious)

You spent all the money while I was in prison?  Now you tell me to get a job fixing toilets?!? Emil pulls the knife away from Tamina - then angrily PLUN it toward Milos' chest! Oleg videotapes it.  Then lowers the camera - shocked tha Emil killed Milos. Blood sprays Tamina's face.  She tries to run but Oleg gr her, not noticing her brushed gold bracelet falls to the floor.  He covers her mouth as he points the videocamera Emil who STABS Tamina - absolutely enraged!

flees...Emil hears NOISE in the bedroom - a window openin Emil kicks the bedroom door open.  Sees the window leadin the fire escape.  He dashes to it.  Sees four flights dow the WOMAN, wearing a summer dress.  Barefoot.  Her hair s wet.   She looks up.  She is beautiful and terrified.  She runs down the alley.

She saw! Emil hurries toward the bathroom.  She just got out of th shower.  Her underwear and purse are draped over a chair. Emil grabs the purse.  Finds a CZECHOSLOVAKIAN PASSPORT. opens the cover, stares at her photo and name.

Daphne Hanlova. There's one stamp in the passport - from the U.S. when sh arrived - June 16, 1998.  Underneath is written - 6 MONTH STAY.  Emil flips through the rest of the passport - all blank pages.

Six month visa.  Still here two years later.  They'll deport her if she goes to Police. Emil pockets Daphne's passport and wallet, scoops up her shoes and jacket - enters the kitchen and dumps them on t floor.  He tears through the kitchen cabinets, throwing c and bottles aside.
What are you looking for? Emil finds nail polish remover - looks at the bodies.
I'm going to make a bohemian barbecue. Emil draws the kitchen curtains plunging the room into darkness.

A face comes from the darkness.  It's an athletically handsome man, jogging out of a tunnel towards us.  He's i tie and jacket in Central Park at NIGHT.  He is JORDAN (JORDY) WARSAW.  A sensitive man of rugged honesty.  He runs down the hill in a hurry.  A MUGGER ste in his path.
Got any spare change?  How 'bout a spare twenty?
Look, I don't have time for you, get out of my way!!

Alright, how 'bout all your fuckin' money? The Mugger pulls a knife - and in a whirl of movement, Jo grabs his wrist and disarms him in a deadly, professional manner - hurling him down to the pavement, twisting his a behind his back.  With his other hand, Jordy whips out a BROWNING 9MM from his shoulder holster and places it behi the mugger's head.  Jordy displays his shield.
Okay, you're under arrest!  Now you happy?
Fire Department?  Firemen don't carry guns.
Oh yeah?  Guess again. Jordy handcuffs the Mugger and searches the Mugger's coat pockets - pulling out a handful of driver's licenses and credit cards.
Nice - how many people you ripped off tonight?!  Get up! As Jordy yanks the Mugger to his feet, his BEEPER goes of
You couldn't listen to me, could you? Jordy drags the Mugger to a tree.  Cuffs him so his face pressed up against the bark.
I'll send a cop back for you.
Hey.  C'mon, you can't leave me like this.  Some freak'll come by and stab me! Jordy jogs off across the park.
Wait!  Come back!!

FIRE TRUCKS from three battalions.  Radios CRACKLE.  Ther a crowd growing.  Jordy pushes his way through.  The top floor of the brownstone where Milos and Tamina lived has reduced to smoking ruins.  The trees are covered in debri and soot.  Jordy moves to LOUIE - Battalion Chief.
Lieutenant - take up your line and relieve Ladder Company 60 on the top floor.
Hey, Louie, were you first due?
Yeah, I radioed you guys right away 'cause you got two roasts on the top floor but you don't hafta investigate cause homicide is up there.
Homicide?  Who let them up?  I didn't make it a crime scene yet.
Hey, it's Eddie Flemming.
Yo, Jordy! BOBBY KORFIN - an overweight arson investigator with a qu with and good sense of humor - comes over, pulling on a turnout coat.
Where you been, man?  We got a celebrity!
I heard.  Who the hell let them up there?
I don't know, you think Eddie will give me his autograph?
You see anything in the crowd?  Anybody suspicious?
Naw - I'm sure the suspect's not here.
Oh yeah, why?
'Cause Eddie woulda locked him up by now!

The roof is gone.  The sky is exposed.  It's charred ruin smoked beams and watery muck.  Eddie and Leon are standin what's left of the mattress, looking at Milos and Tamina' charred bodies.  Eddie grips a half-smoked Cuban cigar, listening to Leon.

So, it looks to me - from the sixty-nine position - that they were doin' each other but were so whacked out of their heads they set the pipe on the mattress, lit it up, and they got fried.  What do you think, Eddie? Jordy enters - with Korfin who's carrying a paint can.
I don't know.  We got the experts here.  Show them what you found - I hope you don't mind, we came over to see if we could help. Korfin makes a beeline for Eddie - wanting to meet the celebrity.
Nah, not at all.  Detective Flemming - Bobby Korfin.  My Uncle Tony worked with you at 2-1 back when you were a rookie.
Could you put out the cigar?  Part of the job is picking up scents.
Oh, sure. Eddie puts his cigar out.  Carefully slides it into a cig holder and pockets it to finish later.
Well, I found - check it out - crack pipe.  Looks like they got careless. Leon displays the pipe Emil found on the stairs.  Korfin shines the flashlight on Leon to look at the pipe.
Mind not shining that light in my eyes?
Sorry, bro.
Hey, that's great you guys got it all wrapped up, but you don't mind if we go through the routine?  It gives us somethin' to do.
No, we don't mind.  You mind Leon?
No.  Go ahead.

Thanks.  Appreciate it. Jordy throws a look at Korfin.  Homicide detectives have respect for fire marshals' investigative skills.  Eddie rummages through the apartment - moving into the kitchen living room... Leon watches as Korfin sticks a pencil in charred beam, measuring how deep in it goes.

Okay, Jordy - it was a fast fire, we got good patterns - about thirty minutes old. Jordy moves to one of the corpses.  He pulls on a white rubber glove.  Inserts his finger in the corpses mouth. glove comes out white.
Mouth's clean, too.
Clean?
Don't blow your nose! Jordy's looking at Leon, who was just about to blow his n
The smoke'll permeate your nostrils - burn 'em out.  Let it run.
But you knew that, right? Leon looks at Jordy, then lowers the handkerchief.  Jordy turns back to the corpses on the bed.  Eddie - in the oth room - has found Tamina's brushed gold bracelet on the fl
So the way you see it, two crack heads burned themselves up?
That's what it looks like to me.
And while they're burning up, they're still goin' down on each other?  You got to hand it to them.
(realizes he's wrong - blows it off)

Yeah, well, some people got their priorities straight. Leon watches Jordy, quietly.  With a pair of tweezers, Jo pulls a small unburned piece of cloth from behind one of heads.  Korfin supplies the paint can.  Jordy drops the c inside.
What was that?
Evidence.  Of a homicide. That got Eddie's attention and he comes back to the bedro
You know what that is, right?
No, what is it?
Why don't you explain it, Bobby. (to a fireman joking a wall)
Hey Camello!  You mind punching a hole in the floor?
No problem. (to Eddie and Leon)

Excuse me, gentlemen.  You might wanna back up a little more.  Don't wanna get your pants wet. Leon and Eddie move to higher ground - on top of a burnt set.  Eddie hands the brushed bracelet to Leon.  As Camel hacks at the floor with an ax, Jordy continues to examine bodies and Korfin explains:

They have not soot in their mouths, which means they weren't breathin' before the fire and that usually means they were deceased - and this piece of cloth that my partner found means they were wrapped up in something, probably doused with a flammable liquid and positioned like this on the bed.  To the untrained eye, it looks like an accident. Jordy kicks around the draining floor, reaches down for something.
What's he looking for?
A timer. Jordy finds some wires attached to an outlet, pulls them on the other end is a timer.  Korfin takes the timer from Jordy and moves to Eddie.
Here you go.  A big double homicide.
As Jordy and Korfin exit the brownstone, a CAMERA CREW is arriving.  Jumps out.  Korfin and Jordy cross toward Korfin's car.  They open th trunk.  Take off their muddy boots throwing them in.
You see Eddie's face when I gave him the timer?  Wish I had a picture of it.
He knew all along.
What??

That's why he was so quiet.  He was testing us. Eddie and Leon exit - Eddie carrying a baggie with a time inside.  NICOLETTE KARAS, young and attractive, pushes he microphone at Eddie.  She's smart, aggressive and respect by her peers.
Detective, does it look like a murder?
We don't know that yet.  It's much too early.  There's a lot to be done.
How many victims are up there?
There are two bodies found at this point.
Can we go up to the crime scene?
You know you can't do that.  C'mon.
Is it drug related?
We don't know.  When I have more I'll let you know. Nicolette signals for her camera man, MIKE, to zoom in on Eddie's hand.  She barrels on...

Detective...what's that you're holding in your hand?  Evidence? Mike pans up to Eddie's face.  Other reporters arrive, hurling questions which Eddie easily answers.  Cameras fl as we PAN BACK TO Korfin and Jordy.  Jordy is about to ge the car as he notices, back behind some construction - DA HANDLOVA.  She's still wearing the crumpled summer dress. She tentatively steps out to signal Jordy.  He only catch glimpse of her.  He starts toward her -- knifes through t crowd - but Daphne is gone.
What?
There was a woman - I think she wanted to talk to us.  She looked scared.  Oh shit!  Oh no!
Korfin's car SCREECHES to a stop.  Jordy leaps out.  Suddenly, Jordy stops...the Mugger handcuffed to the tree now NAKED!
You motherfuckin' bastard!  She stripped me!  It was a bag lady!  She touched me all over, it was disgusting. Jordy unlocks the handcuffs.
I'm sorry.  I'm really sorry. Korfin delivers a blanket.  Jordy covers him.
You okay?
A dog pissed on me!!  I'm gonna sue you for this!  You violated my civil rights!

Your civil rights?!  You tried to rob me!  I could arrest you right now!  You're lucky you're walking away from this.  Now get outta here. Jordy gives him a push.  The Mugger wraps the blanket aro himself cursing - hurrying away.
Exhausted HOOKERS who have worked all night loiter outsid sleazy hotel.  CAMERA PANS up to a blinking hotel sign.

The light is blinking an eerie green and yellow light int the room.  Emil is at the window pulling the blind down trying to shut out the blinking light.  He pulls it down twice and it pops back up both times.  The third time he angrily pulls it so hard, it comes off the window complet He sits down in a chair in frustration - adjusting a pill behind his back.  THE ROSEANNE SHOW is on TV.  Roseanne h been talking to a FATHER.
So you slept with your son's wife!  What's that all about?
I take full responsibility for sleepin' with my daughter in law.  I had low self esteem, I thought I had to compete with him. Emil reaches for his dictionary.
(mutters)
Self-esteem?  Self-esteem?? He flips through his dictionary to find the meaning of se esteem.
Losin' my job and everything, caused my behavioral disorder. (turns to his son)

Forgive me, Kirk.  Let me hug you? The audience boos.  Roseanne mediates... Oleg - fresh from the shower with wet hair - sits on the in his skivvies - staring into the videocamera's LCD scre rewinding Milos' murder.  We see it now for the first tim as he rewinds it.  Oleg watches - a bottle of cheap vodka between his legs.  Emil, looks up from his dictionary.  H wearing Milos' Rolex.  Tamina's jewelry - her brushed gold necklace and pearl earrings - are in front of him with Daphne's wallet.  Emi looks up - Oleg is holding his videocamera.
(Czech)
Turn that fucking thing off!
(Czech)
I'm not filming.  I'm watching Milos die.  It's just like a move but realer. Emil grabs the videocamera. (Czech)
Don't break it!  Don't break it!
Speak English!
(English)
You said speak Czech!
How you erase this?

I'll do it.  Don't hurt my camera! Emil tosses the camera back to Oleg who drops his vodka bottle in order to catch the camera.  Oleg, holding the camera like it's gold, goes to the dresser and puts it aw Emil starts to go through Daphne's wallet.
Stupid, Milos.  I didn't want to kill him. (noticing)
What's this? Emil found the last card in the wallet.  It's pink with a picture of a busty globe.  Printed in the middle is - WOR ESCORTS - and a number.

Worldly escorts? Emil picks up his dictionary and begins to flip the pages finding the meaning of worldly.  He gets up and dials the number.  A soft, SEXY VOICE answers.  Soft music in the background.
Hi?
Hello?
Are you looking for companionship? Oleg, who's listening, moves to Emil.
Whore?
I'm homesick.  You have Eastern European girl?  A Czech girl?
Matter of fact, I have a lovely Czech girl.
I take her.  Send her!
Korfin's car pulls up to the station - as a fire engine i returning.
Now that you know him, maybe you can get extra work in the next movie they make about him.
Yeah?
Maybe you can be his stand-in.

The men are pulling off their equipment - coming down fro the high of fighting a fire.  Korfin and Jordy walk towar the TV room.  The TV is on in the background.  We can see Nicolette interviewing Eddie.  He holds up the paint can.
What the hell is that??  You gave Eddie Flemming the evidence?! They turn.  DEPUTY CHIEF FIRE MARSHAL DECLAN DUFFY - the of the arson squad - comes over.  Duffy's tough, Irish an very political.
(pointing to the TV)

Wait a minute.  Wait a minute.

Come alone.  Bring cash.  And we'll talk about surrendering. CLICK.  The line goes dead.  Hawkins disconnects.  Hands phone back to Maggie.  She's looking at him.  Excited.  Hawkins looks at Nicolette.  His mind whirls.
Daphne and Korfin are sitting at a table.  Korfin's arm i a sling, his side bandaged.  Duffy and Jordy enter in the dress uniforms.  Korfin walks over to them.
How was it?
(numb)
Not good. Jordy's quiet.  Dazed.  Nobody can believe Eddie's gone.
(nods to Daphne)
Did the D.A. videotape her deposition?
Yeah.  He finished awhile ago.
(to Korfin)
Alright.  Swing by her apartment.  Let her pick up her clothes and take her straight to Hoover Street.  You got that?
Yeah. Jordy looks at her.  Duffy sees them hold each other's lo
Chief - mind if I take her?

Okay.  But not water sports. Duffy walks out.  Jordy leads Daphne out of the station.  Korfin follows.  A MAN IN A CHEAP SUIT is talking to Came who points as Jordy walks by.  The man chases after Jordy
Excuse me - Jordan Warsaw?
Yeah.
(shoving papers in Jordy's hand)
Consider yourself served. Jordy opens the papers.  Korfin puts Daphne in the car.  Walks back over to Jordy and reads over his shoulder.
Zwangendaba??? Is suing you, the department and the city of New York for 10 million?  Who is Zwangendaba? Jordy remembers...and gets more depressed.
The mugger.
It's an old brownstone - in poor condition.  Jordy pulls Opens the door for Daphne - takes her by the elbow - stee her to the door.  He is edgy.  Jumpy.  Looking around.
Are you alright?
I still can't believe Eddie's gone.
I'm sorry. He looks at her.  Nods.  They walk up to the stairs as th front door opens.  A NEIGHBOR exits, shocked.  Jordy pull Daphne out of the way.
(in Czech to the man)
Hello.  How are you?
Jordy and Daphne make their way up the stairs.  A bouquet flowers are outside Daphne's apartment.
What's this? She takes the card.  Jordy looks over her shoulder.  Daph reads: "Good luck with all your troubles.  I'm here if yo need me...Ludwig."
Is he your boyfriend?
Ludwig?  He's gay - are you jealous?
If I was your boyfriend, I might be.
If you were my boyfriend, I'd suggest you find another girlfriend that isn't going to jail ten-thousand miles away. They're staring in each other's eyes.  The sexual tension strong.
A good Immigration lawyer could stall the process.  Eddie recommended one.
No matter what happens...I'm glad I met you.

I'm glad I met you. They hold each other's eyes...then suddenly they kiss.  Urgently.  Passionately.  Somebody is coming up the stair They part quickly.  A tenant enters his apartment down th hall.  Jordy clears his throat.
Let's get your stuff. He opens the door.  Peers inside - checking it out.  Turn her.  Gestures that it's okay to enter.
It's very small.  Almost no furniture.  The bare minimum. The apartment is a hole.  She looks at Jordy.  Both think the same thought.  Another kiss.
You better get packed.
Right. She holds his look.
Do you have coffee?
In the kitchen.
I'll make some for us.
I'll get my clothes. She heads down the hall.  Jordy enters the small kitchen. flips on the kitchen light and the LIGHTBULB EXPLODES -

head_text.subj: SETTING THE CEILING ON FIRE AND RELEASING A RAIN OF FIRE

text: THE ROOM.  Jordy JUMPS BACK.
Jordy!!!

No!  Get back!  GET BACK!!! Jordy's more surprised than shaken.  It's a fire - he kno the drill.  He pushes her into the living room.  Then not a FIRE EXTINGUISHER hanging on the wall.  Grabs it.  Aims at the FIRE spreading in the kitchen.  He SPRAYS as Daphn

That's not mine! WHOOOOOOOOOSH!  The fire extinguisher FEEDS THE FIRE!  Fl leap up from the fire - shooting toward the extinguisher because it's filled with gasoline.  The handle LOCKS!  Jo CAN'T TURN IT OFF.  Flames engulf the extinguisher and JORDY'S HAND. He flings the extinguisher - BACKS OUT OF THE KITCHEN.  Closes the door.  Jordy takes off his jacket.  Stuffs it under the bottom of the door.  Blocking the smoke.  He hurries into the living room.  Knowing it's moments befor the extinguisher will explode.  Jordy pulls out his cellu Hits the speed dial as he notices Daphne about to throw a chair through the window.
Don't!  It'll suck the flames toward us! Too late.  She SMASHES the window.  There's an EXPLOSION the kitchen.  Smoke and fire rush down the hallway and al the ceiling.  Jordy yells into the phone:

This is Jordan Warsaw!  We got a 1075, make it quick, we're trapped!  8th Avenue and 44th Street. He pulls Daphne toward the bedroom.  It's locked.  Jordy kicks it open.  Grabs the comforter off the bed.  Shoves under the door jam.  He pulls Daphne into the bathroom.  Shuts the door.  Runs his severely burned hand under the water.  Daphne looks out the window - hearing the sirens. She notices someone has nailed the window shut.  And on t of one nail...is Eddie's gold shield.
Oh my G-d!  Oh my G-d! Jordy turns - sees Eddie's shield.
They were here! This freaks her out.  They were in her home.  She starts panic.
Calm down.  Get a hold of yourself!  Get down! He pulls aside the curtain to the bathtub.  In it is a CA GASOLINE.  A virtual bomb.
Oh Jesus! Daphne reaches for the can of gasoline.
What are you doing?

Pouring it out! She grabs the can of gasoline - pours it down the drain. FIRE is raging outside the bathroom.  The bathroom door i beginning to smoke and burn.  They are trapped. Jordy turns - grabs an exposed water pipe that runs up th wall to the ceiling.  He throws his feet against the wall leverage.  Pulls with all his might to break it loose.  I creaking - but he's having a hard time with it.

Oh shit! Jordy looks over.  The gasoline she's pouring out - is no going down the drain.  It's stopped up.  As soon as the f gets in the bathroom, everything will explode! Jordy begins pulling at the rusty pipe with all his might Daphne comes over - helps him.  Both of them trying to br it off.  Suddenly it snaps and water POURS into the room. SOAKING THE WALLS.  They point the pipe toward the door, soaking some of the flames which are consuming the door.  Trying to stop the fire from coming in.  He and Daphne ar drenched.  And trapped. Jordy grabs a broken piece of pipe.  Starts SMASHING the behind them.  The wall to the adjacent apartment.
Jordy and Daphne in the bathroom - surrounded by fire.  CAMERA WHIP PANS down the street as FIRE ENGINES arrive.
is VIDEOTAPING them from the opposite rooftop.  Tenants f Daphne's building are fleeing down the fire escape.  Emil stands in back of Oleg - who is very excited.  He turns t camera on himself.

This is great film!  You can see fire right now - Daphne is in fire - Fire Marshal is here.  Everything is so messy.  Everything is so crazy right here!  Look at this fire!  We made it!  90% of people who die in fire die from eating smoke.  So most likely they all die from eating smoke. The CAMERA PANS to Emil.
And this is the man who started the fire.  Say something to your fans, Emil! Emil waits a beat and then blows a kiss to the lens.

Filled with smoke.  You can barely see Jordy or Daphne.  Jordy SMASHES a hole in the wall - which reveals the bath in the apartment next door.  The smoke has a place to esc There's a 7-year old KID in there.  Standing in the bathr Terrified.
Get back!  Get out of the bathroom!  Run!
The hallway is on fire!
It's okay.  I'm a fireman.  I'm going to help you.  Get back!  Now! Jordy pushes Daphne through the wall - turns as the bathr door catches fire.  It's seconds before the whole room wi blow up.
Across the roof is videotaping the bathroom as it EXPLODE

Fire engines have arrived.  The street is filled with gawkers.  Garcia and Korfin pull up just as Jordy runs fr the building - holding the kid in one arm and pulling Dap with the other.  Carefully guarding his bandaged hand.  A fireman grabs the kid.  Another grabs Daphne.  Garcia and Korfin run to Jordy.
Jordy!  What the hell happened?!
Are you alright, man?  Lemme see the hand!
Where's Daphne?  Daphne? He spots Daphne on the corner as a familiar voice pushes through the crowd.
Isn't she a beauty?  She's my fire, look at that loom-up on her! Jordy turns - it's Max.  The attention pyromaniac who Jor threw out of his office.  As a news crew arrives, Max tur to the cameras.
I did this!  I did this!  Take my picture!  I'm Max!  Max Gornick! Jordy grabs Max - pushes him away.
Get outta here!
What the hell happened?
They were inside.  They booby trapped her apartment! Korfin scans the crowd.  Looking for Emil and Oleg.  In t b.g., Duffy is SCREAMING.
What the hell are you talking about???  They're gonna do what? Jordy and Korfin turn.  The Chief has a phone to his ear is freaked.

as he enters the TV station.  His clothes burnt and still wet.  The lobby's full of ANGRY COPS.  Tommy and Leon, st in his funeral suit, SCREAMING above them all at Maggie t producer and her ASSISTANT, who are standing behind the d
Where is he?!  Where is Hawkins?!
He's not on the premises!
I want the tape.  Go get it and bring it here this minute.

Any request for the video must be directed to "Top Story's" attorney - Bruce Cutler.  I'll be happy to give you his number. Leon jumps over the desk where Maggie stands.  Tommy push past the security guard to follow Leon.  They continue to Maggie, pushing her further back into the office.  She tr to protect herself with an office door which Leon slams o
Lady, if you put Eddie's murder on TV, I'll get a warrant for your arrest and shove it so far up your ass it'll come outta your mouth!
I want your shield number!
Viewer discretion advised!
(pointing at the TV)

You want the tape?  There it is! Leon, Tommy, all the cops and Jordy - turn toward a TV se which is mounted in the lobby.  The "Top Story" logo flas on the screen, then Robert Hawkins is seen behind his des

What we are about to broadcast is very graphic footage... Everyone is riveted.  But Jordy notices outside...a "Top Story" NEWS VAN is waiting in the alley.  Robert Hawkins jumps from a doorway and into the van.  Jordy backs out.

POP...a video POV of a bottle of Crystal as the cork is popped.  The videocamera pans up to Emil sitting at the table.  He nods at the waiter who leaves.  Emil raises th glass - looking into the lens.
America!  Who says you can't be success in America?  I arrived with nothing, knowing nobody - now look - I am a success story! The videocamera is lowered.  Oleg turns it off.  Asks suspiciously.
You are success story?  I am success story!  Why do you say I and not we?

Oleg, don't be paranoid.  You got a hundred-fifty thousand dollars, didn't you?  I gave you half of what they gave me.  Look - here we are! Emil gestures toward the big television set.  We are in Planet Hollywood - where diners and those by the bar can watch a huge screen hanging from the ceiling.  Robert Haw is introducing his show.

Good evening.  Welcome to "Top Story".  Tonight, I present to you material of a graphic and violent nature never before seen on television.  And I do so with a heavy heart.  You will be first-hand witness to the slaying of celebrated New York City Homicide Detective, Eddie Flemming.  It would be only normal to ask, why?  Why are we showing something so journalist, I must show it.  A democracy survives through the freedom of its media, and if we cannot see what is happening then we don't deserve our democracy, or our freedom.  Eddie Flemming was my friend.  I cried when I watched this footage and vowed to fight this violence with every molecule of my being from this day onward.  Hopefully, this will have a similar effect on you.  One final word, this material is absolutely not appropriate for children. The restaurant BUZZES.  Emil checks his watch.
In movie they make of us, who do you think would act me?
The one who got caught in the bathroom. (beat)
George Michael. Emil laughs.  Oleg doesn't.
I'm serious.
Shut up.  Look! Emil points towards the TV.  "Top Story" is continuing. scene cuts to Emil's video footage.  Eddie is handcuffed the chair.  The light illuminating his face.
This is my project.  I say 'action.'  I am the director!  You are the talent.  You wait for me to say 'action.' (beat)
And 'action!'
Bad last moment - I cut it out. Emil looks at Oleg - furious.
I told you to cut that out before we handed in the tape!

Be quiet.  Watch. Oleg watches the big-screen TV as Emil raises the pistol Eddie's temple.  Eddie pushes him over the desk.  Eddie t knocks Emil with the chair and Emil falls off the desk on the floor.  Eddie continues around with the chair and dri Oleg back across the room - pinning him to the wall.  Edd and Emil both go for the gun.  Eddie knocks him out of th way.  Stabs him with the legs of the chair repeatedly.  Leaves him in a ball on the floor.  Oleg comes at Eddie a he knocks Oleg over the coffee table and onto the sofa. blinds and lamp shade are shot - bathing the room with mo light.  Emil stabs Eddie in the stomach.  Oleg kneels dow for a CLOSE-UP.
Die.  Die.
Hawkins' van drives across Times Square.  Jordy's car following.  We WIDEN OUT... Eddie's murder is being broad on the JUMBOTRON in Times Square.  People stare up - stun
The dinner patrons are watching TV.  Shocked.  Emil glare Oleg.
Why did you leave that stuff in about you being the director?
Because I am the director.  Don't you realize, if it wasn't for my film, for my talent, my idea to do this - no way would we be sitting here right now.
Your idea?  I thought it was my idea. Oleg tenses.  Emil laughs.
Aren't you just the cameraman? Oleg doesn't laugh.
I'm serious...this - this is a great American film.  Full of violence and sex.  And I want my credit.
Credit?
Yes.  Before we hand in the next video - I put titles on it and my credit is going to read - Directed by Oleg Razgul.
Yes.  But there's only one problem - you want credit but the problem is - I don't share credit. Oleg is pissed.
You got that?
No, I don't get that!

You think you are a director?  You are a fucking little, small Russian piece of shit.  And I hate you.  I fucking hate you. Emil slaps Oleg across the face.  Oleg stands up.  Emil suddenly pulls out Eddie's gun but before he can pull the trigger, Oleg STABS Emil in the arm!  Emil squeezes off a shot through the crowded restaurant.  Patrons SCREAM - Ol runs through the restaurant, escaping.  It's chaos.  Hawkins arrives with a crew and with BRUCE CUTLER, a confident, tough criminal attorney. Emil pulls the steak knife out of his arm, picks up a nap pressing it to his wound.
Oh, hello. Cutler accesses the situation.
Are you my attorney? (extends his hand to Cutler)
I'm Emil.  I'm insane.
I'm not your lawyer until I see the money.

Here.  I have your money. Emil picks up a briefcase and hands it to Cutler.  Cutler opens it - inside is the cash Emil got from Robert Hawkin Emil looks at the table, pushing the plates and silverwar aside.  Emil looks under the table, throwing the chair as freaking.  He's lost the most important thing in his life
Oh no!  No!  Shit!
(follows Emil - reaching out to him)
Emil.  Take it easy.  Stay with me.  Sit down.  What do you need?  What are you looking for?
He has the camera!  He took the movie! Jordy comes in, gun raised.
Don't move!  Don't move!  Get your hands up!  Drop it! Emil puts his hands in the air.  Immediately drops the gu
I give up! Jordy is disappointed!  He didn't want to take Emil alive Hawkins signals to his camera man, who swings his camera Jordy as he approaches Emil, his gun aimed at Emil's head
This man is unarmed, officer.  He's surrendered. Jordy cracks Emil across the face - knocking him down.
What are you hitting him for?
Turn that camera off! Jordy handcuffs him.  Emil turns to the camera for sympat appearing more hurt than he is.

No.  Keep filming... Jordy realizes how media savvy Emil is and understands in that moment why he's surrendering.  Jordy yanks Emil up - dragging him across the restaurant floor - Emil still favoring his ankle.
(to Emil)
Don't say anything.
Where are we going?
I'm coming with you.
Yes.  Yes, come with me!
(to Jordy)

I'm invoking rights - this man is represented by counsel.  I'm coming with him. The "Top Story" crew is all over them, filming everything Cutler stays close to Emil.  Making sure he's in the vide footage.
Turn that camera off!
As Jordy comes out with a limping Emil, police are arrivi Tommy, Leon and Murphy run over as Jordy opens the back d to his car.  Leon grabs Emil.
I'll take him.
No way!  He's mine!
(holding on to Emil, squeezing his arm hard)
We're takin' him.  Don't argue!
He's my collar!
Well, he killed my partner!
He's yours but I take him in!  I'll drive him to the precinct, you can have him but I'm walkin' him in. Leon realizes Jordy wants to be seen on TV taking Emil in custody.
Okay, kid, have your 15-minutes.  I'll follow you.  Tommy, you ride with him! Leon stares hatefully into Emil's eyes.
You're goin' down, motherfucker, you are goin' down.  I'll be there with a smile when they put you down! Cutler hurries to Emil's side.
Don't say a word.  Don't respond to his taunting! (to Leon)
He's represented by counsel.  You want to speak to someone - you speak to me!
Out of the way, counselor. Tommy shoves Cutler aside.
Don't you put your hands on me, Detective. Jordy pushes Emil in the back seat and slams the door.  L turns to Hawkins, whose cameras are filming everything.
And you, you'll pay for what you did!
(low)
This footage will work in your favor.  When the jury sees this - no matter what Cutler tries, they'll convict him. Leon looks at him. This man used to be his friend.
You outta be ashamed.  Ashamed of yourself.
If I didn't put it on somebody else would!  I was his friend!
Don't give me that fucking shit. The cameras are rolling.
Don't get into it on TV.
(yells to other cop cars)
Alright, let's get going! Leon and the other cops rush to their cars.  Jordy is alr behind the wheel.  As soon as Tommy jumps in the passenge seat, Jordy takes off.  The cameras film him driving away
Jordy takes a left turn, racing away.  Running all the lights.
What are you doin'?  You're gonna lose everybody! Jordy rips through another turn, heading toward the West Highway.  The car speeds up the ramp and races up the lef lane - having lost the police.
Where are you goin'??  This ain't the way to the station! Jordy looks up at Emil in the rear view mirror.
Jordy pulls off on 130th Street.  They are way uptown in middle of nowhere.  The car drives down a dark street.   Crumbled, vacant buildings dominate the streets and there no people around.
The car slows down.  Tommy watches Jordy, realizes what's going on.  Jordy stops at a dead end.  Pulls open the bac door, yanks Emil out and starts to drag him up into the deserted tunnel.
Jordy...??? Listen to me.  You can't do this.  This isn't the way to do things. Jordy ignores Tommy, slamming him up against the tunnel w
Were you a fireman?  That how you knew how to rig the apartment?
My father was.  He gave me many lessons about fire.  Now it's my friend.
Tommy, take a walk.
What are you gonna do?
Don't you get it?  He knew he was gonna get caught!  That's why he videotaped Eddie's murder - he thinks he's gonna get off.
Don't stoop to his level! Jordy tosses the car keys to Tommy.
Take the car.  Get outta here, Tommy.
Look, you can't shoot him in cold blood.
(erupting)

Tommy nervously backs up toward Jordy's car.  Climbs behi the wheel and drives away, leaving Jordy and Emil alone i the darkness.  Jordy takes out Eddie's pistol.  The one E took from Eddie.  Jordy opens the cylinder - two bullets left.  Jordy snaps the cylinder shut, tucks Eddie's gun i Emil's belt.  He drags Emil away from the wall, into the center of the empty space - unlocks Emil's handcuffs and throws them aside.  Still holding the gun on Emil, he cir around to face him.
Get your hands up!  Get your hands up! Now facing Emil, he sticks his gun in his waistband - the same place he put Emil's.
You wanna be a real American?  Go for your gun. Emil holds his arms out - making it clear he's not going the gun.
Pull the gun!  You want to be famous?  Shoot me, you'll get more headlines and make more money. Emil watches Jordy...a slow grin spreads across his face.
You can't kill me.  You're not a cop.  Just fireman with a gun.  I bet you never shot anybody in your life.
You'll be my first. Jordy pulls out his 9mm and pushes the barrel right betwe Emil's eyes.
C'mon.  Pull the trigger.  Do it.  Oh, look, you're sweating.  You don't have the balls.
Get down on your knees. Emil gets on his knees and starts to sing in Czech.  SIRE fill the air.  Police cars come flying down the street.
Where's your partner?
The Sheraton!  On Broadway!  Room 210.  Go get Oleg.  He'll kill you. Leon runs up.  Tommy's relieved to see Jordy didn't kill Emil.

Gimme your gun, Jordy.  We all want him dead but you can't do it this way. Emil is still smiling.  Jordy suddenly slams Emil in the face.  Knocking him to the floor.  He jumps in his car an speeds away.
A room service WAITER wheels a tray with a magnum bottle Crystal, with three glasses, toward Oleg's room.  Jordy follows behind him - gun aimed at his back.
Do you really need me?
Keep your mouth shut.  Don't mess this up. They reach the room.  Jordy flattens himself against the wall.  The waiter KNOCKS.
Who's there?
(nervous)
R-room service. A HOOKER, wrapped in a towel, opens the door a crack, loo out at the waiter.

Come in. Jordy whips around the corner - pointing his gun and push the hooker back out of the room.  Jordy moves to the bedr door.  Peers through the crack.  Oleg sits on the edge of bed in his skivvies with two naked prostitutes.  He's hoo up his videocamera to the TV set and is showing them his footage of the fire.
Look at that.  See that shot!  Seamless.  No cuts. (excited)
And look.  Look at that transition.  That's filmmaking!!  Isn't it great?! Jordy KICKS in the door - gun raised.
Don't move! Oleg grabs the videocamera.  Has on hooker in a head lock picks up the other one.  He rushes at Jordy - using one o the hookers for protection.
Drop the girl!  Drop her!! Oleg pushes the hookers at Jordy - knocking Jordy back in the living room and over the back of the sofa.  Oleg rush out into the
Oleg runs to the fire exit - Jordy follows, chasing Oleg the stairwell.

Oleg bursts out a door which opens onto Broadway.  He run through the crowd - knocking pedestrians aside!  Jordy ch him, gun in hand! Oleg runs into the street, darting in and out of traffic, cars braking to a stop.  One SLAMS into another.  Jordy leaps over a car, closing in on Oleg.  People gawk. Even in New York, it's odd to see a man being chased in h underwear.  Oleg runs, knocking people aside.  He's holdi the camera in his hand.  It's on.
A UNIFORMED COP turns as Oleg runs right into him.  Knock him down.  Oleg beats him, takes his gun and runs into:
Oleg, gun in hand, runs past the TICKET TAKER at the door
Hey, come back here! The ticket taker runs after Oleg who continues past the c counter.  Jordy rushes in the door.
Where is he?  Where'd he go?
Middle door. Jordy continues running through the lobby - past the midd door - and enters the theater through the far door.
Jordy enters the theater, crouches down in the aisle.  It night scene, the theater is dark.  Jordy tries to see fac He cuts through a row of seats to the middle aisle.
Kill him!  Kill the bastard! Jordy spins toward the voice - it's a DRUNK.  Others star YELLING for blood!
Shoot him!  SHOOT! A GUNSHOT!  Jordy ducks!  Another GUNSHOT!  Jordy realize the shots are coming from the screen.

Look!  Over here! Jordy turns.  Oleg stands up and FIRES at him - trying to film Jordy's death with a videocamera.  Jordy ducks, then rises up with his gun as Oleg vaults ov the seats, leaping from one to the other, mashing shoulde and heads, bounding for the screen.

Everybody down!  Stay DOWN! Jordy FIRES as the screen villain blasts away.  Some in t audience don't realize the real thing is happening.  Oleg leaps on the stage in front of the screen, illuminated by Jordy runs down the aisle.  Oleg FIRES at Jordy.  Jordy F back.  People panic - scurrying away - Jordy can't get a clear shot.  Oleg FIRES again, wounding a moviegoer.  Jor raises up as the theater lights go on...and Oleg is gone! Jordy jumps on the stage - runs backstage - Oleg has disappeared.
Shit! SIRENS are heard from outside.  VOICES of cops are heard they enter.
A REPORTER is in Times Square, reports from outside the m theater.

...and the wild chase through Times Square ended with the suspect, Oleg Razgul, escaping.  The fire department has identified the fire marshal involved in the failed pursuit as Jordy Warsaw. The channel is changed.  PETER ARNETT is reporting the sa story.
In a related matter, Mr. Slovak's attorney, Bruce Cutler - famous for handling sensational cases - claims his client is unfit to stand trial.
Daphne sitting on a bench in a jail cell.  Watching TV through the bars.  She is in the fire department's holdin cell in Brooklyn.

In fact, Cutler claimed Mr. Slovak was not the alleged mastermind behind the murders.  According to Cutler, Mr. Slovak was being directed by his partner, who threatened to kill him if he didn't follow Mr. Razgul's orders.  Cutler told reporters today that Mr. Razgul did in fact stab his client. The scene CUTS TO Cutler's press conference.
My client, Mr. Slovak, is a victim.  What's happened is not his fault.  Emil was under the influence of his partner.  At the trial, you'll see that my client will be vindicated...

The CAMERA WIDENS from the TV set.  We are now in an interview room, a guard is posted outside the room.  Emil sits at a small table - with Cutler.  Emil is dressed in Bellevue clothes.  He's handcuffed and his ankle is banda Emil gives a complimentary nod toward Cutler.
I brought you some letters.  It's really fan mail.  Women mostly.  One wants to buy you clothes, another sent a check.  Another wants a check.
You bring the cigarettes?
Oh, sure. Cutler shakes a cigarette out of the pack, stuffs it in Emil's mouth and lights it for him.  Emil has never smoke before.
How're they treating you, alright (Emil is nonresponsive)

I want to get the cuffs off... but there's a little bit of a problem.  Things out there are very negative right now for us.  We gotta change that around.  Perception is very, very important.  Perception is reality.  I know you're not fuckin' crazy.  But it's important that I get that message out.  Cause that's our only defense in this case. Emil leans forward.  Cutler retrieves the cigarette from between his lips.
I want you to focus on three things: fear... He puts the cigarette back in Emil's mouth.
...delusions and paranoia.
I was all of these.
Well, you didn't appreciate the severity of it until recently.  No question about that.
What about Oleg?
Disappeared.  They're looking everywhere.  Maybe he went back to Czechoslovakia.
No, he is here.  Shit...
Don't worry about him.  Think about yourself.
What about my movie rights?  Book rights?
Look, I haven't really focused on that kind of thing.
What's your cut?  How much?
I would say...half.  Half is fair.
(laughs)
No.  No way.
But it's...
Thirty-percent.  No more.  Or I call another lawyer.  This is the biggest case of your life.  Don't try to negotiate.  Thirty percent.  Say yes or no.
This is not about money, Emil.  I need your trust in me.
What else do you need?
I need to know about your background.  I need to know about your upbringing.  Why you're here.
(indicating cigarette)
Give me another one, please. Cutler stuffs another cigarette in Emil's mouth.  Lights
Tell me about yourself.  What you did as a young boy... what your parents were like.
My father always degraded me.  Killed my self-esteem.  And my mother was blind.
Your mother was blind?
Yeah, she went blind giving birth to me.  She went to fucking black market doctor to induce me.
Back in the Czech Republic?
Yeah, yeah...bad doctor gave her bad drugs which made her go blind.  And my father blamed me for her blindness...
Your father blamed you for your mother's blindness?
Yeah, he hated me from day when I was born.  Put it out.  Can you put the cigarette out? Cutler takes the cigarette from Emil's lips and extinguis it.
That's what he did to me.  He put cigarettes out on me.
Your father put cigarettes out on you?
Out on my back when I was a small boy.
Can I see your back? Emil rises.  Cutler comes around and pulls his shirt up.

head_text.subj: ENTIRE BACK IS COVERED WITH DISGUSTING PURPLISH WELTS FRO

text: CIGARETTE BURNS.  Cutler recoils - horrified.
Oh, Jesus.
I'm abused.  Don't you think?
I don't think it's abuse, I think it's torture.
Inside the Arson Squad, Duffy sits behind his desk.  Jord stands across the table from his Chief.  Behind Jordy we see Garcia and Korfin outside, listening.  Duffy has a subpoena in his hand.
The public doesn't have any idea what we do and now you're going to define our image!  This is going to be our Rodney King!
What was I supposed to do?  The guy tried to mug me.  I was gonna send a cop back - I just forgot.
Forgot?  You handcuffed a civilian to a tree?!
Chief - I know I screwed up - but this guy was no innocent civilian.
Well this is gonna end your career and probably mine.
End my career?

How are you going to fight this?  Maybe if Oleg hadn't gotten away and you'd been on the front page, as a hero, this thing would be easier to fight.  You'd have the good to weight against the bad!  It's unfortunate that I have to make decisions based upon your press coverage but there's nothing I can do!  Gimme your shield.
But Chief?  Over this??

There's nothing to talk about.  Get a good lawyer.  You're suspended until your trial. Jordy sighs.  Dying inside.  He surrenders his shield.  D his handcuffs, his pager and his gun.  Duffy picks up the - looks at it.
(pats Jordy's shoulder)
I know you got backup at home.  Drop it off. Jordy sighs and exits.
Jordy is talking to BILL STERN, a senior special agent. another office we see Daphne with two 25-year old ASSISTA U.S. ATTORNEYS.
(to Jordy)
Look, what don't you understand?  We've got a good relationship with the Czech's and the State Department doesn't want to cause an incident.
But the D.A. needs her as an eyewitness!

They've got her testimony on videotape.  And even if they do take her to court immediately after she'll be extradited.  The Czechs want her back.  She shot a cop!  I mean, Christ, man, what if Emil Slovak and Oleg Razgul fled to the Czech Republic?  How would you feel if the Czechs wouldn't give them back to us?! Stern looks over at Daphne sitting in another office.  Lo his voice.
And just between us...I was married to a redhead.  They're a jinx.  Redheads are like cross-eyed priests.  Stay away from both. Jordy gives him a look.
You want to see her - go ahead. Jordy enters the other office.  Sits next to Daphne.  The assistant U.S. Attorneys leave.
We're gonna fight the extradition. Daphne takes Jordy's bandaged hand in hers.
Forget about me.  You have enough problems of your own.
...Do you really want me to forget about you?
I don't want to drag you down with me.
Daphne, I... Daphne touches her finger to his lips.
Shhhh. She leans in and kisses him.  Then looks into his eyes, trying to find a smile.
It's weeks later.  Nicolette is looking worn, tired, frazzled.  She's trying to go through her stand up.  But she's unraveling.  Not recovered from the loss of Eddie.

...and today with his partner who he blamed for the crimes still at large, Emil Slovak will appear in court.  His lawyer will argue that he is mentally  unfit to stand trial.  Eyewitness News has also learned that later this month, Jordy Warsaw will himself be appearing in court.  He will be arraigned on charges of violating the civil rights of...Zwangen...Zwagen...
Zwangendaba.
Goddamn assholes everywhere.  Zwangenbobby..Zwangendaba.  I got it.  I'll do it.  Shit.  Let's start again.  5-4-3-2-1... She starts over.

Jordy's on the couch.  A drink in his hand, watching TV w his dog, ZACK.  Jordy's eyes are glazed.  He's drunk, his eyes are as bloodshot as Eddie's were...without his job o Daphne.  His mind miles away - the dog and drink are his only comf As Nicolette reports (she got the name right), her anger seeps through her broadcast.
Mr. Zwangendaba claims to be a direct descendent of the African King from whom he takes his name... Jordy's face is flashed on screen.  The phone RINGS.  Jor picks up.
Hello? (listens)
No comment. He hangs up.  The phone RINGS AGAIN.
Hello? (listens)
No! Jordy hangs up.  Changes the channel.  He stops as Robert Hawkins' face fills the screen.  He is standing across fr someone - in a park - interviewing him.

He robbed you? The ANGLE CUTS to Zwangendaba, the mugger, now dressed in suit and tie.  Clean shaven and with a fresh haircut.  He stands in the same spot where Jordy handcuffed him to the tree.  He's appearing on "Top Story".

That's right, I encountered him right here.  I was just askin' for change an' he whips out his big gun an' pushes me up against that tree, whereupon he takes my money and handcuffs me to it, leavin' me there all exposed... The phone RINGS again.  Jordy suddenly pulls the phone of the table and throws it through the window:
as the channel is changed.  A REPORTER is on TV.  Behind is a picture of Emil.  Emil is smiling, in a shirt and ti The reporter stands in front of the jail.

...and WBAI has learned that Mr. Slovak won't have to worry about how he is going to pay for his defense.  He has received movie offers and been in conversations with numerous publishers concerning the rights to his life story.
Oleg is at a bar watching TV.  Poisoned with envy.
Jordy stands in front of the mirror over the dresser.  We the TV overturned in the b.g.  His back up gun is on it. stares at it.  Dark thoughts dancing in his head.

Jordy sits in a taxi, wearing sunglasses.  Looking inside park where a POLICE BARRICADE surrounds a POLICE TUGBOAT. Cutler and Emil are arriving - Emil is being transferred Rykers Island.  Jordy pulls his .38 out of his ankle hols and sticks it in his pocket.
to $42.00.  The TAXI DRIVER looks in the rearview mirror.
I can't believe this guy got off.  Unbelievable. Jordy takes out money.  All he's got is fifty bucks and h crams it into the slot.

Whatever's leftover, keep. Jordy exits the cab.  The anger rising inside his body is coming to a boiling point.  He walks into the park.  Leon sitting on a bench.  Just sitting there.  Also filled wit rage and frustration.  Jordy meets his eyes.  Leon gets u and walks away.  Disgusted by it all.  Jordy's right hand grips the gun inside his pocket as he walks on.
Many policemen are trying to control a swarm of reporters All are waiting for Emil.  WE SEE:

and his camera crew, and, not far from him - frustrated a frazzled, waits Nicolette.  Still grieving her loss, she looks over at Hawkins and his crew.  She shoots him a disgusted look - Hawkins shrugs it off.  He checks his wa anxious - looks at his cameraman.
He said he'd be here.  Pick him up as he comes through the crowd.  Do you hear me?  For Chrissakes don't miss this.

Cutler's car behind it.  Emil - handcuffed - is unloaded the van.  Reporters swarm forward - Cutler gets out of hi car, hurrying up, taking his place alongside Emil and the POLICE ESCORTS.  The swarm follows - firing questions at Cutler.  He answers the barrage of questions with:

...my client was suffering from a major illness of schizophrenic nature wherein during times of intense stress, as a result of paranoid and psychotic delusions - there was impairment of his ability to appreciate wrongfullness... This is a victory for the mentally ill! Jordy walks alongside the moving mass.  His eyes focused Emil - his hand in his pocket.  We notice in the crowd Ma the celebrity-crazed pyromaniac.  What's he doing here?  Max's hand is also stuck deeply in his pocket.  A weird g in his eye.  We see Korfin in the group, speaking to othe cops.  Nicolette and her camera crew are vying for their place in the mass.  She watches Emil with quiet rage.  Cu continues:

...before Emil boards the police boat and heads for Rykers Island where he will be checked into the psyche ward, I want to say one last word to you all... As you know, Emil was coerced by Oleg Razgul into committing these murders, yet Oleg is still out in the street, a free man, filming gruesome murders... My client and I hope he is brought to justice in the near future. They are through the monuments, approaching the steps whe Jordy passes a distracted Hawkins - who's checking his wa obsessively.
Where the hell is he?  Goddamn it?! Jordy glares at Emil.  Emil looks back at Jordy, gloating Smiles.  He won.  He beat the system.  Jordy suddenly eru
You think this is funny??  What the hell are you laughing at? Emil stares down Jordy.  Jordy grips the gun inside the jacket.
(to a nearby escort)
Officer, keep this man back, he's assaulted my client on previous occasions. A PATROLMAN blocks Jordy from Emil.
This is it?  This bastard kills the best cop this city ever had and we do nothing?
You may not like it marshal, but that's the law.

And what about the other victims??  What about their families?  He'll end up in some country club nuthouse while his lawyer sells his rights to the movies and we just stand here and do nothing?  We let this scumbag walk? Jordy moves past the officer.  Emil breaks away from Cutl Gets in Jordy's face.  Laughs quietly.
Be careful.  I can kill you.  I'm insane. Jordy shoves Emil into Cutler.  A scuffle breaks out as t cops separate the two - pulling Jordy back as we cut to:
as it approaches Hawkins from behind.  A hand dips into f tapping Hawkins on the shoulder.  Hawkins turns - sees wh he's been waiting for.  His face lights up.
I thought you wouldn't show up.  Where is it?  Where is the tape?
In disguise - sunglasses and a hat.  Holding his videocam
It's all in here.  All in here.
has been separated from Cutler and Emil as Hawkins' voice cuts above the din of the crowd, announcing excitedly:
Wait a minute, Bruce!  We've got some interesting evidence, something you should look at! Reporters turn as Hawkins speaks.  His crew is taping as continues introducing his broadcast:

I have exclusive rights to the ORIGINAL UNCUT videotape shot by Oleg Razgul, proving Emil Slovak was not insane!  Hard to believe...watch! Reporters swing their cameras over as Oleg holds his videocamera up in the air.

He knew exactly what he was doing - all of this was planned!  It's all here in my movie.  Emil is not insane.  Look.  Look! Oleg PLAYS his videocamera as lenses focus, we see excerp of the moment where Emil explains to Eddie:
...so we kill someone famous and if we are caught, we are sent to mental hospital...
(points to Oleg)

Officers, there's your killer, do your duty, arrest him! The police are attempting to get to Oleg, but a sea of reporters separate them.  We hear the staccato calls from press corps.  Nicolette looks on in amazed outrage.  Jord notices and starts moving towards her.  Before the POLICE CAPTAIN in charge of the detail can react, the rage which killed Milos, Tamina and Honey wells up inside Emil.  He yells at Oleg!
Traitor!!
No.  You are the traitor.  You are murderer.  I am director.  Action! Oleg pulls his gun.  Emil pulls Cutler in front of him as

Oleg FIRES!  Cutler is SHOT and goes down.  Hawkins swing his camera over to Oleg - filming the would-be assassin.  Oleg FIRES off another SHOT - hitting the COURT OFFICER escorting Emil.  Emil grabs the down officer's gun.  He swivels - rapid fires at Oleg.  Oleg topples.  People are screaming.  It's CHAOS. Emil darts forward - grabbing Nicolette who is closes to He puts his handcuffed arms over her head - points the gu her head.
Drop the gun!  DON'T SHOOT!
I'll kill her!  Back off!  Everyone back away from me! We hear Jordy's voice above Emil.
Let her go.  Let her fucking go!! The captain is screaming at all his men.
No one shoot!  Lower your weapons!  Do not fire!  No officer will fire his weapon unless I say so! (to Emil)
Let the woman go! Cops reluctantly lower their weapons.  But Jordy is still aiming his gun at Emil.  He is the only one who hasn't lowered his gun.  The captain is yelling at him.
Holster your weapons!  Back away.  That is an order!  No officers will fire! Emil is screaming back at the captain as Jordy screams at Emil.
Tell him to put his gun down!
Let her go!  Let her go!!

If he doesn't lower his gun I'll fucking kill her. Jordy doesn't lower his gun.  Emil tries to back away.  T reporters - who have ducked and covered - are still keepi their lenses pointed at the scene.  This is great film!  Jordy follows after Emil - his gun raised.
Let her go.
Shoot!  Shoot him!!
Shut up! Meanwhile, the captain is still yelling:
No on shoot!  No one shoot!!  No officer will follow.  No officer will shoot! Nicolette is still encouraging Jordy.
Shoot!  Shoot!  Shoot him!!

Shut up! Everyone is screaming at once.  It's mass chaos.  The cap is trying to keep everyone calm.  Cops following along wi their weapons lowered.  All except Jordy - his gun still pointed at Emil.  Hawkins can't believe what footage he's getting.  He's pushing his cameraman to the front of the pack.  Trying t get the best coverage.
I'll surrender!! I'll surrender if he lowers his gun. He's pointing at Jordy but he's continuing to back away towards the police boat.
Don't.  Don't let him surrender.  Shoot him! Jordy won't take his gun off him.
Let her go.  Let her go. The captain is yelling at Jordy.

Lower your weapon.  I told you - lower your weapon! Jordy struggles to get a clean shot at Emil.  He can't. heart pounding.  Adrenaline pumping.  He suddenly lowers weapon.  Turns away.  The captain visibly relaxes.  Emil laughs.  Jordy suddenly turns back.  Quickly raises his weapon.

Emil takes a shot in the leg.  Nicolette ducks under the handcuffs and scurries away.  Emil looks at Jordy - surpr he shot him.  Jordy FIRES AGAIN.  Emil is hit in the shoulder.  Jordy marches forward, EMPTYING HIS CLIP in Em chest.  Abdomen.  Head.  Gun fire echoes in the humid air Emil stumbles back.  Does a funny dance and drops to the ground.  Dead.  The captain yells.
I told you not to shoot!  No officers should shoot. Jordy quietly answers:
I'm not a cop.  I'm a fire marshal.
He's still alive. Hawkins looks down at Oleg.  He is sprawled on the ground His videocamera in hand - he's still making the movie.
as it ZOOMS from the Statue of Liberty and PANS to Oleg. looks in the lens with his dying eyes, gasps:
A film...by Oleg Razgul. And Oleg dies but suddenly his eyes pop WIDE OPEN.  Hawki jumps back, Oleg smiles, coughing in pain.
How was that? Oleg's head rolls to one side.  Now dead.  Nicolette runs over to Jordy.  Composing herself.  Coming together.  Gla Emil is dead.  Jordy starts to walk away.

Wait a minute.  Where are you going?  Learn from Eddie.  Talk to the court of public opinion.  Take the credit, you need it. She turns him around.  Straightens his tie.  Starts to pu the hair out of his face but he stops her hand.

No thanks. Jordy puts something in her hand.  She looks down.  It's EDDIE'S BADGE.  The one Jordy took out of Daphne's bathro She looks up at him.  Her cameraman rolling.  The lens pointed at Jordy.  Jordy looks at Nicolette.  Meets her e He doesn't want to make a statement.  He still doesn't wa the fame.  He did learn from Eddie.  Eddie was killed bec he was a celebrity.  Jordy wants no part of it.
Cut. Her cameraman lowers his leans.  Jordy smiles.  She nods. Jordy turns and walks away.
Get a shot of him leaving.  Then pan to me. Jordy disappears into the sea of people.  The camera PANS back to Nicolette.
Well, he wouldn't talk to us, but you saw it. The CAMERA PULLS BACK from Nicolette's face and the video now on:
We PULL BACK FURTHER and FURTHER.  Nicolette finishing he stand up:

New York City has a new hero, Fire Marshal Jordan Warsaw.  I hope that Fire Marshal Warsaw's heroic actions this afternoon will help with his other legal problems.  WB11 has also learned that the fire Marshal has retained an immigration lawyer to help Daphne Handlova with her case.  We wish her well.  This is Nicolette Karas, live at Battery Park, WB11 New York.  Good night.
